r.d: Monitoring extension for PHP, collects error events and send them to one of the drivers. SQLite and MySQL drivers are storing those in a database. More drivers to come (SNMP, e-mail, Hadoop,...).
r.n:
Added: - --with-debugfile[=FILE] option to permit debugging of APM
Changed: - Lazy loading the connection to the SQLite database
Fixed: - Ordering by URL not working - Decouple mysql backend from sqlite3 (#62288) - Invalid UTF-8 may cause backtrace to be truncated in MySQL driver (#62244)
